name: Once Bitten
description:
*** CONTROLLER RECCOMENDED ***
*** TO USE KEYBOARD AND MOUSE YOU NEED TO USE A CHROME BROWSER  ***

Grim has employed the services of VWZ Ltd to collect souls for his friends party.

You choose your monster and set off on the mission that Grim phones into you.

Use WASD or Left Stick to move

Use A or Left Mouse to bite

Use X or Right Mouse to carry

And send the victims off on their travels by dropping them in the Soul Hole and hitting A or Left Mouse button

Oh, and avoid the security guards, you can always hide in a locker by pressing A or Left Mouse button...

Good Luck!
